properties.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 1 at 8:43PM PST until March 2 at 10:00AM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow occurring. Plan on slippery road conditions.
Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with localized
amounts up to 5 inches, are expected.

* WHERE...Mainly elevations at or above 4000 feet, but some snow
could fall on the lower slopes, including the desert foothills.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibility at
times in snow, blowing snow, and fog. Portions of the Cajon
Pass could be impacted with icy road conditions tonight.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered
roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

For road condition information in California...enter
8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or
9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY
